FAQ.title: Questions about AI business automation
FAQ.description: We resolve common doubts about AI agents and business automation

0.question: What is an AI agent for business automation?
0.answer: An AI agent is an intelligent program that automates specific tasks autonomously. At Agentika, we create custom AI agents for business automation that integrate with your existing tools to automate repetitive processes like email sending, lead follow-up, report generation, etc.

1.question: What business processes can be automated with AI agents?
1.answer: We can automate virtually any repetitive business process: customer follow-up, personalized email sending, report creation, system integration, data processing, inventory management, and much more. During the free business automation analysis, we identify the best opportunities to implement AI agents in your specific case.

2.question: How long does business automation analysis take?
2.answer: The initial business automation analysis takes between 3-5 business days. First you complete a detailed form about your business processes, then our team analyzes your case manually and presents a personalized proposal with recommended AI agents and estimated automation benefits.

3.question: What if I don't want to pay for business automation?
3.answer: Perfect! The business automation analysis is completely free and without commitment. You will receive a detailed report with recommendations on AI agents that you can implement on your own if you wish. We only charge if you decide that we implement any of the proposed AI agents for your business automation.

4.question: Can I deactivate AI agents whenever I want?
4.answer: Absolutely. There are no permanencies or long-term contracts for business automation. You can pause or deactivate any AI agent at any time. Our goal is for you to get real value from business automation, not to retain you by obligation.
